name: Subway Skating Surfers 3D
description:
Subway Skating Surfers
Subway Skating Surfers is an amazing game in the infinite mission oriented runners. You will be skating through the train tracks in snow and trying to reach the highest score! Speeding Up, Jumping，performing various tricks on the train tracks and landing safely to become the perfect skater boy.You only need to accelerate or jump over the obstacles on the road and get the scores as possible as you can. Run along the craziest scenarios in the skating subway surfers. Test your reflexes as you race through the fast skating surfing game. Magnets can help you collect more coins. This is an outstanding skate boarding game.This is the best kids touch skate game in the world. Become the skate boy with professional running skills and join the leaderboads.

- Go wild in the Skate World!
- The way to play is very easy!
- You can get the points multiplier and reach a much higher score!
- Turn and Run as fast as you can!
- Amazing sound effects!
- Great skating physics for runner is implemented
- Stunning next generation graphics

Enjoy the Subway Skating surfers 3D
